ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Just another newb
ygData.msgSnippet: Well then David it appears that i am only slightly ahead of you...i did however make lvl 7 last night...still trying to figure out how i can get out there and
ygData.messageBody:
Well then David it appears that i am only slightly
ahead of you...i did however make lvl 7 last
night...still trying to figure out how i can get out
there and "practice" without my partner so i am not so
tentative when we are playing together...i know the
right things to do but seems i get flustered when the
fire gets hot!! Anyway, grab a copy of the game David
and i hope to see you out my way one day soon...You
too will become addicted...it is only a matter of time
and "resistance is futile" :-)

Naara, Barb Warrior
aka Chryseas, High Elf Cleric


--- David Langille <tuxedomystery2000@...>
wrote:
>
>
> Hi, i'm new meself. I don;t even have the game yet.
